title: Singed's new passive can only be stacked 25 times
body:
its sad
(this should be indicated tho)

replies.body:
You're trolling, right?

How can you be this dense
i want vandiril to spend hours stacking movespeed

Good to know. Unlikely it may be.

It's sad. I'm sad. T-h-e-s-u-n-i-s-a-d-e-a-d-l-y-l-a-s-e-r
Having a limitation for a 2 sec movement speed buff is pretty dumb tbh, when you have Kindred with infinitely scaling range, Veigar infinitely scaling AP and Thresh infinitely scaling armor and AP.

> [{quoted}](name=Report for Wuju,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dAQQr9qp,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-07-12T11:11:27.120+0000)
>
> Having a limitation for a 2 sec movement speed buff is pretty dumb tbh, when you have Kindred with infinitely scaling range, Veigar infinitely scaling AP and Thresh infinitely scaling armor and AP.

Having that one Black Market Brawlers item as a passive would be OP. Ya know, the fun one. And in live situations getting 25 applications seems unfeasable.
How in the world would you find this out

you can proc it on allies as well
so if you run in a circle of allies/ennemies, with good timing you can easily stack it up
